title: Cultural Competency Enhancement Training for Disaster Management Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic disaster management theories, practical experience, and foundational understanding of multicultural societies
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based LMS with emphasis on practice-oriented case discussions

learning_goals: Explain at least three decision-making procedures considering cultural differences in disaster situations
Analyze conflict cases in multicultural environments and propose effective communication strategies
Recognize personal cultural biases and reflectively assess their impact on disaster management practices

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
